name: Alice's Moo-vie night
description:
Is boredom milking you dry? Do you feel seen but not herd? Nothing amooses you anymore?

LOOK NO FURTHER!!

**THE POSEIDIAN DAIRY SOCIETY INVITES YOU TO MOO-VIE NIGHT**

The RPG in which Alice goes out on a quest to recover the cursed ingredients and save her sorry bottom!

Fight horrific monsters!

Find your way through deadly labyrinths!

And help a sweet old lady survive!

Action develops in Poseidia, a part of Mysteren universe, where our upcoming visual novel, Enigmarella , takes place (Summer 2021)

And the best thing about it:

Additional art and story by Ella Blackheart

Original music composed by myuu

Reccomended for ages 13+
